telephone_number.description: Phone number in any common format. Strip spaces and hyphens if needed.

policy_number.description: The unique identifier for the policy.

coverage_type.description: Type of insurance coverage (e.g., Homeowners, Auto, Renters).

policy_effective_date.description: Policy start date. Must be normalized as YYYY-MM-DD.

damage_deductible.description: Deductible amount in numeric form. Remove currency symbols and commas.

date_of_loss.description: Date the damage or loss occurred.

time_of_loss.description: Reported time of loss. Prefer HH:MM in 24-hour format.

date_prepared.description: Date the claim form was completed.

property_address.description: Full address where the covered property is located.

mailing_address.description: Mailing address for correspondence. May match property address.

cause_of_loss.description: Narrative cause of the loss (e.g., burst pipe, fire, natural disaster).

loss_description.description: Detailed description of the damage, including affected rooms, systems, and impact.

damaged_items.description: A table listing each damaged item, its description, acquisition date, and costs.

item_name.description: Name of the item (e.g., 'LG OLED TV').

date_acquired.description: Purchase date for the item. Format as YYYY-MM-DD.

cost_new_replacement.description: Original or replacement cost. Convert from currency format.

claim_disclaimer_text.description: Full disclaimer text appearing in the form. No summarization.

policyholder_signature.description: Name or representation of the policyholder's signature.

signature_date.description: Date the signature was made, if provided.
